Question: However, he kicks it in a 1981 TV special, It's Magic, this person when he was invisible.
Hints: He is thoughtful and intelligent, but this person is constantly hindered by his own self-doubt, or by others tearing him down.
This person also has a problem of letting people take advantage of him, or not sticking up for himself when people pick on him.
In response to which, this person utters a vigorous "Ha!" to Lucy.
